version_description:
Introducing Clips: Now you can create clips of your favorite audiobook passages for later listening or sharing with friends, plus do everything you could previously do using Bookmarks.

Bug Fixes and Other Improvements:
Narration Speeds – We’ve corrected the 2.5x and 3x playback speeds to play at the correct speed.
Navigation Interruptions – If you use Apple Maps, enable the ‘Pause Spoken Audio’ setting for Apple Maps to enjoy a seamless listening experience while you drive.
Headset Controls – We’ve fixed a bug that blocked use of Fast-Forward and Rewind from the headset controls.
Other fixes and performance improvements.

This update fixes a bug that caused a small number of users to lose their place in their audiobook.  The app now properly saves your place when you switch between books or when you pause while using headphones or other remote devices.
This update fixes a crash that a small number of users were experiencing while listening to finished books offline.

What’s new in 2.11
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
• Redesigned FAQ makes it even easier to find answers to your questions
• Clips: now you can add a note right after creating a clip and see time and date stamps in the Clips & Bookmarks library.

What’s New in 2.12
·      You asked for it and we have delivered, now get the entire app in our Dark Theme! You can adjust the apps appearance by either going to settings or the player’s overflow menu.  
·      Clips can now be sorted chronologically or by chapter. We also allow you to delete clips by simply swiping left.
·      Various bug fixes and improvements to make your app experience even more enjoyable.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

What's New in 2.13
* You can now search your entire library using your native iOS search for users on iOS 9+
* Sharing from the player is now easier than ever
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

New! Audible Channels is now free for Amazon Prime members.

Audible Channels was recently introduced to critical acclaim and features a consistently refreshed and thoughtfully organized selection of Audible Original programming and exclusive content. A $4.95 monthly or $60 a year value, Channels offers a variety of episodic programs, distinctive comedy, lectures, and audio editions of standout articles from the pages of The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, Harvard Business Review, Foreign Affairs, McSweeney’s and other leading periodicals. 

Audible Channels also showcases Audible Playlists, 20 signature listening experiences hand-selected by Audible editors to suit every preference and updated daily, from essential stories of the day, meditation selections and commute-sized comedy to accessible and engrossing compilations on science, history, technology and more.

• Fixed an iOS10 issue affecting some users who were experiencing a lag in the app performance

• New! Audible Channels is now free for Amazon Prime members.

Audible Channels was recently introduced to critical acclaim and features a consistently refreshed and thoughtfully organized selection of Audible Original programming and exclusive content. A $4.95 monthly or $60 a year value, Channels offers a variety of episodic programs, distinctive comedy, lectures, and audio editions of standout articles from the pages of The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, Harvard Business Review, Foreign Affairs, McSweeney’s and other leading periodicals. 

Audible Channels also showcases Audible Playlists, 20 signature listening experiences hand-selected by Audible editors to suit every preference and updated daily, from essential stories of the day, meditation selections and commute-sized comedy to accessible and engrossing compilations on science, history, technology and more.

What do technology and the wilds of nature share? Bugs! Essential in nature, annoying in technology; bugs are a fact of life. But, here at Audible HQ, progress has been made. With this release we have vanquished several issues that were getting between you and your listening enjoyment:
•Fixed a number of issues related to iOS 10 
•Addressed an issue with the audio stopping while playing in the background

Happy listening!

With this release you’ll find some nice updates, bug fixes, and a little suggestion on how to be a bit more comfortable in the coming cold weather.
 
You know those huge headphones everyone seems to be wearing these days? They also work pretty well as ear muffs. As a bonus, the lovely voice of your favorite narrator will be wrapped around you like a cozy blanket, even if she’s narrating a bone-chilling thriller. Brrrr!
 
What’s new in 2.17
•         When you open the app in your library it now remembers if you were on Cloud or Device
•         Fixed an issue that prevented bookmarks from appearing in iTunes Books
•         Solved the skipping issues that some users experienced while listening to Channels
•         Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements
 
Stay cozy!

Start your 2017 with an even better listening experience! We filled our latest update with some of your biggest requests and improvements:

· We heard your request and have added the sleep timer to the player
· Your Mark as Finished status is now synched across devices 
· The player is now more responsive for our older devices 
· Minor bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixing and Performance Improvements.
This update fixes a bug in our previous release that caused a small number of users to be signed out of their app.
This update fixes a bug in our 2.24 release that caused a small number of users to lose their position in their audiobook.

What’s New in 2.25

• Car Mode – Our new, simplified display makes it easy to listen while you’re in the car. To turn on Car Mode, tap the car icon on your player screen (not available on iPad).
• Easy sign-on – Save your Amazon username and password in Safari and you will have the option to automatically log into Audible with those credentials. Just make sure you have saved your Amazon password in your device Settings under the Safari tab.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

What’s New in 2.25.1

• Car Mode – Our new, simplified display makes it easy to listen while you’re in the car. To turn on Car Mode, tap the car icon on your player screen (not available on iPad).
• Easy sign-on – Save your Amazon username and password in Safari and you will have the option to automatically log into Audible with those credentials. Just make sure you have saved your Amazon password in your device Settings under the Safari tab.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Leave your phone at home and take your Audible books with you on Apple Watch. Sync your Audible titles from your iPhone and play them from your Apple Watch via Bluetooth. Rewind, pause or set a sleep timer from your watch. 

- Now, members get MORE: Two Audible Originals and one audiobook every month.

- Leave your phone at home and take your Audible books with you on Apple Watch. Sync your Audible titles from your iPhone and play them from your Apple Watch via Bluetooth. Rewind, pause or set a sleep timer from your watch.

- Now, members get MORE: Two Audible Originals and one audiobook every month.

- Leave your phone at home and take your Audible books with you on Apple Watch. Sync your Audible titles from your iPhone and play them from your Apple Watch via Bluetooth. Rewind, pause or set a sleep timer from your watch.

- Now, members get MORE: Two Audible Originals and one audiobook every month.

- Leave your phone at home and take your Audible books with you on Apple Watch. Sync your Audible titles from your iPhone and play them from your Apple Watch via Bluetooth. Rewind, pause or set a sleep timer from your watch.
- Now, members get MORE: Two Audible Originals and one audiobook every month.

• Fixed a rare crash that could occur when selecting a different chapter

We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

New Features
• Added the ability to set a custom length for the sleep timer
 
Improvements
• The audio now fades out over a longer duration so that the sleep timer doesn't end so abruptly
 
Bug Fixes
• Fixed a couple localization issues with the Library tab
• Fixed a crash that was occurring for some Apple Watch Series 3 users
 
We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

New Features
• Added the ability to set a custom length for the sleep timer

Improvements
• The audio now fades out over a longer duration so that the sleep timer doesn't end so abruptly

Bug Fixes
• Fixed a couple localization issues with the Library tab
• Fixed a crash that was occurring for some Apple Watch Series 3 users
• Fixed a crash on launch that was affecting some users with multiple devices.

We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

Improvements
• It's now easier than ever to share using the standard iOS sharing menu
• We've made numerous improvements for our VoiceOver users, including making download and sync progress accessible
• When connecting to CarPlay, you'll now be brought directly to your library instead of needing to tap it every time
• It's now more convenient to rate and review Audio Shows when you're done listening

Bug Fixes
• Fixed a bug where resuming playback of a book via Control Center would cause the book to automatically pause again a second later
• Fixed some localization issues in Discover and Library
• Fixed some issues that would occur when switching between Light and Dark theme
• Fixed an issue that was affecting a small number of titles when playing on SONOS that would cause the skip forward/back actions to not work correctly
• Old periodicals that you're no longer subscribed to will no longer appear in your library
• Fixed a crash that would occur for signed in users when downloading an excerpt
• Fixed a rare crash when viewing the list of chapters for certain titles
• Fixed a crash when trying to play content on the Apple Watch when the paired iPhone was set to certain languages
• When deleting a book from the Apple Watch, the watch icon now correctly disappears from the same book in your library
• Deleting a book from the Apple Watch while it's playing now actually deletes the book

We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

Improvements
• We've heard you, and now when setting a sleep timer for the end of the chapter, the audio will no longer fade out over the beginning of the next chapter

Bug Fixes
• Fixed an issue where the narration speed would reset to 1x when switching to a different book
• Fixed a few crashes related to our integration with BMW ConnectedDrive
• The "Send this Book" prompt will now only appear for titles that can be shared
• Fixed a few other small crashes and bugs

We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

Improvements
• We've made a number of improvements for our VoiceOver users
• Refined the player screen in preparation for upcoming features

Bug Fixes
• Fixed an issue where downloads could get stuck in the queued state
• Fixed an issue where the playback progress bar in Control Center would not be updated correctly
• Fixed a rare crash when downloading a book that has enhanced chapter titles
• Fixed localization issues for Spanish speakers
• Fixed localization of the listening history graph

We're constantly striving to make your Audible experience better. If you have feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us at audible.custhelp.com or on Twitter at @audible_com.

Improvements
• We've improved the overall experience for our VoiceOver users
• Improved performance of downloads, so now you'll be able to start listening faster

Bug Fixes
• We fixed a number of crashes that were affecting a small number of users.

We’re constantly striving to make your Audible listening experience better. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audiblesupport.

Improvements
• Audible Escape subscribers can more easily find titles included in their unlimited listening package by browsing by featured category
• It's now easier than ever for Audible Members to be able to choose their two Audible Originals each month
• We've made the now playing and settings screens more accessible to VoiceOver users
 
Bug Fixes
• Fixed a crash that could occur when downloading items in your library
• Fixed an issue where contacting Customer Service would fail for some users
• Fixed the issue where the Chapters list incorrectly displayed chapters that haven't yet completed downloading
• Fixed a layout issue in Discover that caused text to be clipped for certain titles
• Fixed the Clips & Bookmarks screen so that the timestamp is always visible
• Fixed a rare crash that could occur when skipping to a different chapter

We’re constantly striving to make your Audible listening experience better. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

Improvements
• Improved VoiceOver support for the chapters list and sleep timer
 
Bug Fixes
• Fixed an issue that could cause the app to become unresponsive and crash
• Fixed a number of crashes related to playback
• Fixed a rare crash that could occur when viewing parts of a multipart book in your library
• Fixed the tap target for the menu button for each item in your library so it's easier to tap
• Sharing multipart books no longer shows the loading state indefinitely
• Fixed an issue where some users would be prompted twice to resume their last position when starting playback
• The chapters list now refreshes correctly when the next part of a multipart book begins playing
• Fixed some clipped text in the button free screen

We’re constantly striving to make your Audible listening experience better. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

Improvements
• Improved VoiceOver support for the chapters list and sleep timer Bug Fixes
• Fixed an issue that could cause the app to become unresponsive and crash
• Fixed a number of crashes related to playback
• Fixed a rare crash that could occur when viewing parts of a multipart book in your library
• Fixed the tap target for the menu button for each item in your library so it's easier to tap

We’re constantly striving to make your Audible listening experience better. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

New Features
• Use credits to add titles to your library right from the app
• Add any free titles to your library directly from the app
• Note: Features may be introduced over time

Bug Fixes
• Fixed a crash when viewing a books details from the player screen
• Fixed an issue where the summary would not appear correctly on the books details screen
• Fixed a crash when attempting to share a book from the player screen
• Fixed a rendering issue with the chapter list
• Fixed a rare crash that could occur when interacting with carousels in the Home tab
• Fixed an issue where the app might crash when seeking or changing chapters
• Fixed an issue where the app could hang indefinitely
• Fixed an issue where the sleep timer would not extend when choosing to extend it
• Fixed some issues with dark theme not using the correct colors for certain screens
• Fixed a number of under-the-hood crashes
• Fixed a crash that could occur when starting playback of a book that was just downloaded
• Fixed an issue where the close button on the player screen was difficult to tap

We’re constantly striving to make your Audible listening experience better. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better. 

Check Out What's New! 
• Your library loads even faster. 
• The sort function in your library now ignores articles such as "a, an, or the." 

Improvements we've made to this version include: 
• Fixed a minor bug that occurred when viewing detail screen for certain titles. 
• In some cases marking a title as finished caused an error. This has been fixed. 
• Removed rare bug that was impacting user reviews. 

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

What’s New: 
At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better. 

Check Out What's New! 
- PDF content can now be shared and opened in other apps 

Improvements we’ve made to this version include: 
- Localization improvements 
- Improved theming support when using iOS 13 (integration with the system theme is coming soon) 
- Added the search button to the category screens in Discover 
- Carousels that contain audio clips or videos in the Home tab will no longer auto-scroll while that content is playing 
- Fixed a crash when creating a bookmark/clip 
- Audio will no longer repeat when skipping forward or back 
- Fixed some font issues on iOS 13 

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible.com.

What’s New: 
 At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better. 
 
 Check Out What's New! 
 - PDF content can now be shared and opened in other apps 
 - Settings has been redesigned to make it easier to manage your preferences
 - Transferring content to your Apple Watch should be more reliable now
 
 Improvements we’ve made to this version include: 
 - Localization improvements 
 - Improved theming support when using iOS 13 (integration with the system theme is coming soon) 
 - Added the search button to the category screens in Discover 
 - Carousels that contain audio clips or videos in the Home tab will no longer auto-scroll while that content is playing 
 - Fixed a few crashes, including one that occurred in the background causing audio to stop playing
 - Audio will no longer repeat when skipping forward or back 
 - Fixed some font issues on iOS 13 
 
 If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

Improvements we’ve made to this version include: 
• Users with old accounts (those that use a username instead of an email) will no longer be unable to sign in
• The library should no longer display duplicate entries for some users
• Fixed a few miscellaneous UI issues and crashes
 
 If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

 At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

• Your app's theme can now follow the system theme, or you can set it to always be light or dark.
• Devices with smaller screens now correctly show the Share button on the player screen
• Fixed a couple crashes/freezes that were occuring on app launch for some users
• Fixed a few bugs for our VoiceOver and large text users
 
 If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better. 

What’s Improved:
• Accessibility VoiceOver support has been improved throughout the app

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed an issue where the time remaining in the mini player might show a negative value.
• Books in the library occasionally showed artwork for a different title.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better. 

New to the app, a whole new library experience!
• Find titles by listening status: With the new "Titles" feature you can filter your titles to started, not-started & finished. Cloud/Device tabs are simplified to "All" and "Downloaded".
• View titles organized by genres: For those who seek organization without the effort, books are automatically organized by Genre. 
• Create your own custom folders/collections: Create folders with unique names and add titles into collections for custom organization 
• Favorites: Favorite selections for easy access to your most listened titles; re-listen over and over again 

What’s Improved: 
• Improvements for our VoiceOver users 
• Increased tap area for close button in the Player, making it easier to dismiss 

Bug Fixes: 
• Theming issues which caused elements to be incorrect color in Dark Mode 
• Issue refreshing library for multipart items that could cause downloads to fail 
• Mismatch between Control Center skip amount and how much audio is skipped 
• Rare crash that could occur when Player was opened at exact moment Sleep Timer ended 
• Library failing to refresh on sign in. 

We're still trying to track down the cause of the library loading indefinitely in other situations. If you are running into this, please reach out to customer service. 

This will be the last version that supports iOS 12. In order to continue getting updates, please upgrade to iOS 13.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.
